code:
/**
 * 该文件专门用于暴露一个store对象，整个应用只有一个store对象
 */ //引入createStore， 专门用于创建redux最为核心的store对象
import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';//引入汇总后的reducer
import allReducers from'./reducers';//引入redux-thunk，用于支持异步action
import thunk from'redux-thunk';//引入redux-devtools-extension
import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';//暴露store
export default createStore(allReducers,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));
